extension.name: Zoom Zoom
extension.description: Yet another extension for integrating CiviCRM and Zoom. This extension provides CiviRule Actions to create Zoom Webinar or Meeting, update Zoom details based on Event Triggers. CiviRule Actions to register, delete Zoom participants based for Participant Triggers.
extension.comments: Credit to Lighthouse Consulting and Design, Inc for developing https://github.com/lcdservices/biz.lcdservices.civizoom which was used as the basis for this new extension. Credit to Veda Consulting for developing https://github.com/veda-consulting-company/ncn-civi-zoom which was used as reference for the CiviRules implementation.
